solution_line_template: Mary originally had {original_screws} screws, then went to buy twice more screws and ended up with {original_screws}+({original_screws}*{multiplier})=<<{original_screws}+{original_screws}*{multiplier}={total_screws}>>{total_screws} of them.
She then split them into four piles of {total_screws}/{num_sections}=<<{total_screws}/{num_sections}={screws_per_pile}>>{screws_per_pile}.
